name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Willie COPLIN, Appellant

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Willie COPLIN, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John W. Packel, Anne L. Saunders, for Willie Coplin.
Catherine Marshall and Karen A. Brancheau, Philadelphia, for Com.
casebody.head_matter:
712 A.2d 281
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Willie COPLIN, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 20, 1998.
John W. Packel, Anne L. Saunders, for Willie Coplin.
Catherine Marshall and Karen A. Brancheau, Philadelphia, for Com.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
